# state

**Instance Property**

The status of the connection.

## Declaration

```swift
var state: NWTCPConnectionState { get }
```

## Discussion

Use Key-Value Observing (KVO) to monitor the state. Many methods, such as reading and writing on the connection, are only valid when the state is `NWTCPConnectionStateConnected`. For information about KVO, see [https://developer.apple.com/library/archive/documentation/Cocoa/Conceptual/KeyValueObserving/KeyValueObserving.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/10000177i].

## Monitoring the connection status

- **NWTCPConnectionState**: Defined connection states. New types may be defined in the future.
- **isViable**: The viability of a TCP connection indicates whether or not data can be transferred.
- **error**: The connection-wide error property.
